articles.title: Long Covid: MRI scans reveal new clues to symptoms - BBC
articles.description: Further evidence emerges that a serious infection can leave some major organs with long-term damage.
articles.content:
People living with long Covid after being admitted to hospital are more likely to show some damage to major organs, according to a new study. 
MRI scans revealed patients were three times more likel… [+3214 chars]
